title.rendered: Zimbabwe vs Ireland, 3rd T20I, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Zimbabwe: Craig Ervine (c), Innocent Kaia (wk), Tadiwanashe Marumani/Gary Ballance, Wesley Madhevere, Sean Williams, Ryan Burl, Clive Madande, Brad Evans, Wellington Masakadza, Richard Ngarava, Tendai Chatara

Ireland: Andrew Balbirnie (c), Ross Adair, Stephen Doheny (wk), Harry Tector, Curtis Campher, George Dockrell, Tyrone Kane, Gareth Delany, Mark Adair, Fionn Hand/Barry McCarthy, Graham Hume

Venue: Harare Sports Club, Harare

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 2 games.)

First innings average score: 129

Second innings average score: 134

Weather: Clear

Wickets per innings: 7

Wins

Batting first: —

Batting second: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

For the second T20I, Harry Tector and Ross Adair were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

From Zimbabwe, only Ryan Burl and Sean Williams have featured in the Ultimate in both matches.

Although Craig Ervine averages only 15 at the Harare Sports Club, he has an impressive record against Ireland. In 7 innings, he has accumulated 283 runs at a staggering average of 57.

Ervine and Williams are also the top two run-getters ever in the format against Ireland. While Ervine has collected 338 runs at 43, Williams has added 173 runs at 43.

Only once has Mark Adair gone wicketless against Zimbabwe. He has bagged 19 wickets, including the best figures of 4 for 23 in 8 games.

It has not been an easy time out there for the batters. Only one batter has registered a half-century in the first two games. The second-highest score is 42.

10 batters (top and middle-order) have been dismissed for a single-digit figure in this series.
